articles.title: Citigroup to hire up to 500 people for expanding Hong Kong wealth management - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Wealth centres in Hong Kong and Singapore to benefit as Citigroup revamps its consumer banking operations in Asia.

articles.title: Citibank to exit retail banking in 13 markets across Asia, Europe but Singapore unaffected - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Citigroup Inc will be exiting its consumer banking franchises in 13 markets across Asia and Europe as part of its ongoing refreshing of its strategy, the American banking group announced on Thursday (April 15).
